website_summaries.verdict: Between its super-simple Headless Mode control scheme, durable frame, terrific camera, and entertaining “press to do cool tricks” option, this makes for an excellent beginner’s quadcopter drone.
pros: Performs a flip with the press of a button
Incorporates Headless Mode for easier flight controls
cons: The camera cannot sync or connect to a smartphone mid-flight

website_summaries.verdict: Best-selling hobby drone at an appealing price point is perfect for beginning and advanced fliers.
pros: Headless security and anti-interference system keep the drone stabilized in flight, even in windy conditions
Strong, solid motor and easy-to-master controls
cons: Flying time is only 5 to 7 minutes while battery takes 60 to 80 minutes to charge
Also has issues with circuit board overheating

customer_reviews.title: CAUGHT ON FIRE updated
customer_reviews.text: I am updating this review because holy stone customer service is great. This drones battery pack caught fire in my home. It happened and I want to be honest so others can make an informed purchase. However they have really tried to make things right and they have asked for detailed information so they can investigate what went wrong. Stuff happens...every product has a few duds.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey choyce

customer_reviews.title: So easy an old guy can fly it
customer_reviews.text: I am 71 years old, and have always wanted to fly a remote control plane or helicopter, but they were just too expensive to experiments with. I bought this affordable drone, spent some time getting familiar with the controls, and flew it for the first time with incredible success. It does all the hard work for you! Just give it enough power to get to the altitude you like, point it in the right direction, and tell it go where you want. Rotate it in flight to smoothly turn around and come back to you. Even without the camera, it is incredible fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ken E

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned on 1st use outdoors! Lost.
customer_reviews.text: Malfunctioned and flew away. Played with in the house a couple of times to get the hang of it. First time it was taken into the back yard it was as though someone else had a remote, and even those nothing was being moved on the controller, the drone rushed up high into the air until the lights could barely be seen. My family searched the neighborhood, asked neighbors, and even put up flyers. It's just gone. Too expensive of a toy to have only been able to use twice indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Can not hold up in any wind, breeze or slight air flow AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the second time using it. Cannot hold up to ANY WIND at all. Got this a Christmas present for my husband last year and he waited for the most calm day, which was so calm we couldn't even feel a breeze, and this darn drone got swept away in the slight air current. Then the second time my husband used this drone, it quit mid air and never would work right after that. Very disappointing especially since I paid a pretty penny for this drone.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: copter worked fine, downloaded videos and every one was apparently corrupted
customer_reviews.text: revised review: after 1st time out getting some video, copter worked fine, downloaded videos and every one was apparently corrupted. videos were not playable. yes there were some hard landings but they were all in tall grass. shouldnt have damaged camera if thats why they arent playable. Revised Review #2. quadcopter makers sent a complete replacement copter. it works fine and video is also working on this unit. excellent customer service, quick and painless! not often that you can find a company that stands behind their product aswell as Holy Stone. A++
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product but even better customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Bought it for my son for Christmas!! I will say we had a pretty hard crash and it still works. Lost one blade guard but customer service was available via Facebook chat and sent me the info i needed right away and was very helpful!! I will say this when my son and i lost it lol we noticed two things. One we need more practice but two, the range on this dron is crazy!!! Over a great product for an even better price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Borden

customer_reviews.title: This drone flys excellent and is totally stable
customer_reviews.text: This drone flys excellent and is totally stable. Were coming off of a $25 drone that needs to be flown totally manually and this is WAY WAY easier to fly. More stable and the altitude hold makes it much simpler compared to 100% manual flying. This drone is super fun and super easy compared to what were useto. If you can fly a very basic totally manual drone that does nothing automatically, you can fly this one easily. The auto land is really neat and works very well. You can cancel auto land during the sequence by moving the throttle stick. Holy Stone did a good job on this one BIG FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It flew away when I turned it on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it yesterday, took it to the park this morning, and turned it on. The lights on the helicopter indicated it synced to the controller, however there was no communication; I didn't have any control over it. I went straight up and kept going until it was out of site. I'm out just over a hundred bucks, but I really hope it didn't land on anyone or anyone's car.
customer_reviews.author: mofftarkin

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone were great and sent me new motors as part of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a complete novice and it took me a while to get the hang of the stabilizing gyros and then all was well. Unfortunately I did crash into a branch in the learning curve and managed to burn out a motor. Holy Stone were great and sent me new motors as part of the warranty even though it was pilot error!!! I have enjoyed this drone and am already planning on my upgrade so I can video soccer practice and games. Seems like this is a great model to start out with. I haven't tried the camera yet as I removed it to make sure I didn't harm that in my learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: The Brit

customer_reviews.title: I called Amazon and they were happy to help with a full refund even sent me ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drone for my husband for Christmas and him and our some played with it for about 5 to 7 minutes and put it back on the charger. The next morning they got up to play with it again and 2 of the motors wouldn’t work. We called the manufacturer and they didn’t want to replace the drone they only wanted to replace the motors. It was only played with in side our house. I called Amazon and they were happy to help with a full refund even sent me a return label so we could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have beginners drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun drone and a good beginner’s drone. It is pretty sturdy with the exception of the landing gear which became loose after a couple of landings. That can be “fixed” by putting a little plastic a wrap in the hole where the landing gear goes into the drone. I am very happy with the customer service that we received. Customer service deserves five stars. We were assisted by Wendy who helped with syncing the remote. She reached out to me a couple days later to make sure that we were enjoying our drone. Then, she sent an email a month later to make sure that we were still satisfied with our purchase. We are very satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Nice Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I stay in India. I had ordered this drone in US and took it back to India. The drone camera was not working when I checked in India. The customer service team of Holy Stone was extremely helpful and Courteous . They sent a new the drone camera to me at no extra cost. The camera is working now. All this is after six months since the product was ordered. I must express my most sincerest of Thanks to Holy Stone team for this out of the way gesture. I have never seen such lovely customer service anywhere. Thank you very much !! I can safely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abolee Valsangkar

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's easiest to look up this drone on YouTube for how to start flying. The instructions that come with it are a little confusing, but kind people have posted clear directions online. I'll tell you that after watching a short video, a seven year old was flying it in a way that stunned her mother (note: a mid air flip is done with one button which a child might push accidentally). The image quality is not the best, but this is an inexpensive drone. A child needs to practice inside first, then stay away from trees and rooftops outside. Customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: This thing flies so much better than I expected. I have purchased so many "Cheap" drones over the years that just don't fly straight, don't respond to the remote and crash into everything.... Not this!! This flies very steady, very powerful and is easy to control. I was very impressed with how well this worked, that I bought a second one for my other kid. The only negative is that the battery only lasts for about 10 minutes.. You will definitely want to have a few batteries on hand so that you can spend some quality time at the park.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a beginner, this is the drone for you. This was easy to fly. Once you start the engine and throttle just a little, it will hover and not take off anywhere. Very easy to move around. Only a couple things I'm not big on is that if the motor burns out, you can get replacement parts but you have to know how to soder the new motor to the circuit board. The other issue is the battery compartment. when you plug in a different battery, the connecting wire can be a pain to get the battery door closed. Other than that, it's a great drone for first timers.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy drone for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Had this drone for a few months after purchase, and it was very sturdy for a beginner. We'd sometimes run it into trees or fences carelessly, or get its props in the grass, and it'd be just fine. Very sturdy. However beware how you calibrate its vertical takeoff...one day I miscalibrated it and it took off very high. It was caught by winds and carried away from the park. If you loose it before its batteries die at night, you can find it by its blinking LEDs sometimes...they are bright.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service and a Great Drone
customer_reviews.text: Update: 8 June 2017 - Phenomenal customer service! Couple of email exchanges and they are sending me a replacement camera for the drone and a spare battery for my inconvenience. It flies pretty well, even for a beginner. The battery life is pretty short, about 5-7 minutes. No surprises there and as advertised. However, all of my photos and video are upside down! Doesn't seem to be a common issue. I'll reach out to their customer service and then either send the unit back or see if they fix it. I'll update the review at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Very good drone; great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent a used, malfunctioning F181 to me instead of a new one. Holy Stone offered to replace missing parts, but I had no idea what was missing or why it had been returned to Amazon. Then, to my surprise, HS said, keep the one Amazon sent and they would send another. They did! The new one works fine. I've generally flown it is a tight area in the house. After a few flights, I've stopped crashing it, and I'm having fun. I purchased this to use as a practice drone before getting the DJI Mavic Pro drone. The F181 is serving it's purpose. Finally, HS customer service is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chekika

customer_reviews.title: Great, purchase. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After sitting in the box, 3 of 4 of the drone blade guards bend in and it prevents the blades from rotating completely. Easy enough to bend back out out and fly the cra In v2, might want to think about turn the guards them down (we unscrewed them and inverted and it works great) 1) Helps with rough landings and prevents obstacles from touching the blades from underneath (more common than from above) 2) Does not bend in and inhibit blade rotation over time. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: crackercortex

customer_reviews.title: Great drone!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Got a discount after contacting Alex! It came with items described and even upgraded micro SD card! Highly suggest this great product. NEW UPDATE: Been a few months, drone has been great, few battery issue (plastic peeling apart a LITTLE), but overall great! Great product, easy for beginners, and overall AMAZING! Pros, Cheap Great For beginners Easy controls Many modes Flies High Great connection Not so good, The return option doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Yue

customer_reviews.title: Great Flying Copter
customer_reviews.text: This drone flies great right out of the box. It is easy to bind and fly and is pretty stable for a light drone. The headless mode works well. The video quality was pretty good and works best in slow steady flight. When I was moving the drone quickly with turns, spins, etc. the video quality suffered some, but at this price that is to be expected. The drone is solidly constructed and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12-year-old's birthday and he loves it. It took some practice getting used to the controls but it is very fun to fly and the tricks are impressive. It has sustained a few hard knocks already with no damage, hasn't needed any of the replacement propellers included yet. We would (and have) recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 year old son. He has a small indoor drone he's played with but we still weren't sure how it was going to go flying this bigger one outside. He finds this one to be very easy to control though. We've also been impressed with the video. We weren't expecting there to be audio with it but it's actually pretty good. Our son flew it into a tree and started laughing and said "I didn't just fly it into a tree." Turns out he was recording at the time and we got his comment on video with a picture of a tree branch.
customer_reviews.author: ChristieS

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! And Company customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I selected this product based on the reviews, product feature and price. BTW I lost my first drone and the customer service is gracious enough to replace it when I posted a request in forum! I am just spell-bound the way they try to help their customer. I would suggest that you try this inside the house before taking in open area as it is a really really powerful drone and you may inadvertently lose control if it is in a expert level mode and you are not able to figure out control option quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chinuk11

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best value and most capable
customer_reviews.text: Overall, exceeded expectations. I've bought about 6 different quadcopters over the years. This is by far the best value and most capable. Flight characteristics are predictable and stable. Flight time is better than expected. Camera quality is A- but still better than I expected. The ability to change (by hand) the camera elevation angle is a nice touch. Camera card has to be reformatted between each download which is a minor inconvenience. Still well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is no DJI drone; it doesn't have GPS, or wireless camera, it is not a stable camera platform, no gimbal or stabilization, and the camera is only 720p. Range of the controller is nothing to write home about, and it doesn't return to home when it loses signal so it can fly away. But, it is perfect for a beginner. It is tougher than it looks, important because you will crash any drone, a lot. A good flyer, and a perfect way to figure out if you like this stuff without spending $500. It has a headless mode which can help a beginner. If you understand this is your gateway quadcopter and don't expect
customer_reviews.author: Rex Deaver

customer_reviews.title: i get my drone and it flys smooth and i love it, the camera is decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Sooo, i get my drone and it flys smooth and i love it, the camera is decent quality, then i start having problems. The sd card dropped from the camera ( never to be found again) , the drone won't hover at all and goes where it pleases, even if you reset it. It twitches weird midair,AND if you go above 20ft, It hits an invisible line and WON'T I repeat WON'T come down. Do not buy this prduct!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my adult son the Predator last Xmas even tho' he didn't think he wanted a drone. He was surprised he enjoyed it so much and decided to get the F181 step up. It's been nothing but a pain. The Holy Stone customer service is great, people are right about that, they replaced the first one immediately but the second one is already history 2 days later. The gears under the propellers are plastic and one has already stripped. My son says it's so under powered it wasn't fun anyway, he won't bother to send it back. He said he's done messing with it. Just to let you know - meantime the little original Predator just keeps humming away.
customer_reviews.author: desertwiffie

customer_reviews.title: The Quadcopter drone is a lot of fun to learn to fly
customer_reviews.text: The Quadcopter drone is a lot of fun to learn to fly. However, for this older man the instruction book was not very clear on how to charge the battery. Seems you need a phone charger to plug the drone charger into. However, the instruction book does not state that. Also there seems to be a SIM card pre loaded into the drone, the instruction book never talks about this. Also the drone comes with a thumb drive, but once again I have no idea what to do with it, as the instruction book never talks about. So I guess you understand computers and such, you may not have such a hard time. Larry
customer_reviews.author: lawrence eugene dundas

customer_reviews.title: Defective after three uses.
customer_reviews.text: We've probably used it three times since we bought it. I tried to use it today and the blue and red lights keep blinking and nothing happens. Update: I was approached by the seller and the problem was resolved to my satisfaction. I've upgraded my rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Great drone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. We tested it out and worked perfectly way beyond what I thought it would be. Super easy to fly, hovers at start up. We actually flew this drone on a full battery on take off it just flew straight up and even after trying to bring the drone down with the correct controls it was too late. The drone flew straight up and never came back down. After talking to customer service(who were very understanding of what happened even offered to replace the drone at half off) I just decided it best to not buy another. Freak accidents happen but I'd rather not be responsible for downing an airplane with a drone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little quadcopter for beginners! Easy to set up and pretty easy to fly. Also, really durable. Get extra batteries because they don't last long. UPDATE 11/6/17: Had some trouble where my drone wouldn't bind with the remote, but Holy Stone customer service took care of the issue and sent me a new drone. These drones are a bit tricky to bind which is my reason for 4 stars, but the customer service you receive is incredible. I hope to get many good flying days out of this new one. Thanks Holy Stone!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Beginner Drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone for my kids, both fairly young. With just a little bit of coaching and practice, both have been able to successfully fly this successfully. It flies well and fairly easily and the charge lasts for a good amount of time. I did order extra batteries and a charger, which helps to extend playing time. Pros: - easy to learn to fly - takes video and photos - easy to assemble - lightweight Cons - video and photo has to be downloaded to view (easy to do with supplied USB)-- - Propeller guards could be a little bit more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent features and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the original package I received and the customer service department promptly took care of it. When I say take care of it, they went above and beyond. It was refreshing. The product itself is great. I've been flying smaller/cheaper quad copters for a while, and I've owned quite a few. The flight stabilization of this device makes it great for recording videos and a lot easier to fly than the others I own. I think this quad will shine the most when you want to record video inexpensively and beginners will really appreciate the landing assist and hovering features.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hackman

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors. Not great for outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners and indoor usage. It's lightweight, so any wind will blow it a mile away from you. Although if using indoors for practice using drones, it's great. The camera quality is not good, but for $60, I wasn't expecting much. I love the tricks you can do with it (flipping in every direction.) The battery life is not long, but it does come with a backup. If you're willing to spend the money just to learn how to fly a drone, it's a great buy. I would not encourage the buy for any sort of advanced usage.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good little starter drone. Pretty easy in low/no wind zones .
customer_reviews.text: First one ascended w a slight pull to the left, I know this brand is good, and thy make great higher end drones , and this model is a great little starter drone , my 8 yr old nephew learned in 10minutes with his. I bought two, one just didn’t operate normal so seller sent new one ! It works perfect gust like the other . This drone is good to learn on or just have a little fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Platinum Member

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this Drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone for my Husband for Christmas. He was so excited as he has been wanting a drone for a while. The only complaint I would have is the directions are not thorough enough for Tech challenged older people. We got stuck, but my husband went on line and watched a few videos he found on the model and got it figured out eventually. He loves it and once he got it all together and charged he had it flying in no time. We live in the Northeast and had snow on the ground so he hasn't had a chance to fly it outside yet. I would definitely recommend this Drone. If we can do it anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control and durability .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is fond of video recording and taking aerial pictures. He simply loved it as his first drone . The best part is, as this was his first drone and its been 3 months now it is still doing its job . So I would say it’s pretty robust . It came with extra propellers if you happen to break any . Battery life is little poor so you need to buy extra pair of battery . It is pretty easy to control . I’m happy with this drone and would recommend for beginners .
customer_reviews.author: sagu

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone Has Terrific Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received my Holy Stone F181 RC Quadcopter Drone today (3/27/18) from Amazon.com (Sold by Holy Stone). It arrived in great shape, was complete in all the pieces that are supposed to come with the drone except for the 2nd EXTRA FREE battery. I've contacted Holy Stone and talked with Martina about getting the missing battery. She was very, very nice and after taking some information from me she said she would ship me the battery right away. So far I'm thrilled with the drone and the Holy Stone Customer Service. As soon as I am able to fly this quadcopter for the first time I will write a subsequent review of it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to screw in the landing stands!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that the landing stands were supposed to be screwed into the drone, so I lost both of them during the drone’s first flight. I was also hoping that I could watch footage from the drone’s camera in real time but I could not figure out a way to do so. *Update: Holy Stone has amazing customer service. I received an email from the company and feel much better now. If you want this drone with real time video, check out the F181W model!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: i am 12 years old and beginning to start using drones this was the perfect drone for a beginning
customer_reviews.text: To start off, i am 12 years old and beginning to start using drones this was the perfect drone for a beginning. First, the packaging was great everything was there. Second i flew it in to a few trees and got it stuck and i got it down it still worked and i crashed in to a few other things But i am still learning how to use the drone. Third my friend started using it and he got used to it he never flew a drone before and he also crashed in to a few things and it was still flying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun and more durable than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing for about 2 months now. It’s a pretty fun little drone. My son (toddler) loves to sit in my lap while I fly it around, inside or outside! The camera quality is decent for the price. I had run this little thing in to lots of stuff and I think I’ve broken one blade. I highly recommend keeping the bumpers on. But replacing it with the additional parts provided is quick and easy. The battery lasts about 10 minutes and they take an hour to charge. It doesn’t take very long to get the hang of flying it. I’m sure it will provide many more hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Flying blind
customer_reviews.text: Flies well fairly easy to handle, But since your unable to see what the camera sees it's extremely difficult to get the picture you want. It's impossible to get an action shot. So far I've had to take numerous runs at the area then look at the video on the laptop, then try again and again... I wish I'd spent the extra buck to get one that you could see what your shooting. Further experience; The landing skids and prop guards fall off easily and just as easily became lost. Can not find where to order just the skids and guards. They fall off so easily they need to be added to original package as the extra rotors are.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner's drone
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this drone. It was his very first drone and he was able to get the hang of how it worked relatively quickly (but not without flying it into the wall a few times). The controls are kind of touchy, the smallest movements on the remote control and send the drone flying up or down. I have not yet been able to master this drone, but I do not use it nearly as often as he does. Good price for a good drone!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!! Company Should Refund.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if everyone who ordered this for Christmas got a bad batch, but I appear to be one of them. Took off, stopped responding, went straight up, then hauled ass East over the highway and out of site within seconds into first flight. This company should be refunding money for these duds.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This drone is seriously so fun to fly! It hovers nicely and is easy to control. I bought it for my 5 year old and therefore it has been crashed quite a few times (actually, he's better at it than me) and it still keeps going. Holy stone also has great customer service and is very friendly when I've had any issues. I highly recommend this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish on the Drone is horrible. I literally had pieces falling off as I was flying it. The flying distance from the remote is not long at all. If there is even a tiny breeze outside, this thing is all over the place. I couldn't fly it over 10 feet high without having control of it. Not stable at all. I have used it maybe 8 times, and now one motor is fried. This is my third Holy Stone product and definitely my last. My son has a drone from the same company, one of his motors just went out. It lasted a whopping 30 days! Time to move on to a more reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this my first drone. I did some research and found that this model was rated pretty good, and was recommended for first time drone buyers. I have now had it for a full week and have flown it at least four times a day. I bought extra batteries. Long story short I am very pleased with this item it does what it saids. Yes, the camera is not all that great, flying time is short, any thing over a 3 mph wind and you are best to quit. Anyone whating there first drone, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Arond006

customer_reviews.title: Camera issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought an F181C for myself a year ago and really have had fun with it, wind-permitting. I liked it so much a bought one for my grandson for Christmas. He flies it well but the video on the camera DOES NOT WORK. It only shows black. The sound is okay... I am hoping Holystone can help us with the bad camera. I liked my own drone so much I just ordered an HS700 in white, for myself. I may change my star rating depending on how the camera issue plays out.
customer_reviews.author: heymon02

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and a great drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect beginner quadcopter that takes decent video and pictures. My son has had 2 others, both billed as for a beginner flyer and neither one was as easy as advertised. The Holy Stone F181C not only is a great drone to learn with, but the customer service is by far the best I've dealt with for any company. They stand behind their product, and any situation that comes up is resolved quickly.
customer_reviews.author: E sg

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9yr old granddaughter even though is says 14 yrs and over. I have been supervising each use. Teaching her the best way to care for such delicate items. It has not crashed or banged into anything as we have used it in an open field every time. However, it now won't fly. Power is on both remote and drone unit. All propellers are in working order. Batteries are both fully charged. I got it to fly by pushing the left stick left once. Then it quit. I tried troubleshooting according to the manual. It still won't fly. We will keep trying to troubleshoot. Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tota

customer_reviews.title: Nice small first drone
customer_reviews.text: First drone for me- did not want to spend a lot of money seeing if this is something that i wanted to get into. Easy to control, takes good video / pictures (at a fixed angle). Battery replacement is somewhat easy, instruction manual if fair, decent flight time, but still worth purchasing extra batteries. If you are looking for something that will fly a good distance away from you- this is not for you. It does some odd thing with not turning on / has flashing lights, and the manual does not mention any aspect of thins- but overall money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!  Easy to fly for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter has been a ton of fun to fly. It needed minimal assembly, and comes with a small screwdriver to use. I've crashed it a few times and it's still running fine. There are also some spare parts in the box for when something breaks. The copter tends to drift in the air if I don't specifically direct it, but the manual mentions calibration which I haven't tried yet. I don't know what the pictures look like from the built in camera, I haven't bought an SD card yet.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W. McCroy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stabilty Control
customer_reviews.text: I have probably purchased and flown 10 different quadcopter drones and each of them had something that annoyed me. This drone is different. The stability control button makes this the most stable drone I have ever flown. After test flying, my eight year old grandson was mastering this drone. My 6 year old grandson picked it up immediately just watching his brother fly. Purchase the Holy Stone 4 in 1 batteries and charger to extend your experience. Good luck and have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Bill DeGasperis

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It's fun
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's fun, easy to fly for a beginner. and takes a beating. Read the manual before you try it. There are a lot of cool features. My favorites: - Altitude hold (It will stay in the air and not drop if you let go of the controller) - Auto-land (Hit a button and it gently lands on its own.) - Control settings (25/50/75/100% power as you learn to fly it) - Durable (My son hit everything in the house. Nothing has broken or altered how it flies) - 2 batteries+chargers (Long charge time but you have one on standby)
customer_reviews.author: RC-NUT

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drone!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I had a great experience with this drone. Easily assembled and it comes with extra screws and gears. I charged the batteries and within an hour I was ready to fly. I have had some experience flying other drones but none flew nearly as stabile as this drone and those other drones cost more than this one. Once calibrated and trimmed this drone will simply hover in place without any needed inputs. On the slower settings it's great for beginners and the expert setting makes it fun for someone with a lot more experience. I highly recommend this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan W.

customer_reviews.title: Good drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: PROS - Flies well and under control - Easy to assemble - Easy to learn - Durable CONS - Batteries don't last long (5 minutes max indoors without wind) - One week using it and already experiencing motor issues where drone dives to the ground with a full battery (even following recommended rest periods after each use) ------------------------------ Update The customer service is like nothing I've ever seen before in an Amazon seller. They sent me a new drone and although also having some issues with it, I'm satisfied that they're helping me navigate through the issues. My original review is accurate, however given the price, this little drone is a pretty good little flying machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good Drone, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good drone for the price (and without the need for a smart phone!), but it does have a learning curve for control (as all drones probably do). Luckily, this company has fantastic customer service (with a very helpful parts replacement warranty) to get you through that learning period so that you can keep your drone flying properly. My son loves it, and I love that the customer service is so responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: actually never but I felt like I had to send this
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service is great. Contacted me right away and said they are sending a replacement. I don't do this often, actually never but I felt like I had to send this. I got this drone on Saturday and took it out for a spin. Mid flight, one motor just stopped working and I lost control of the drone. It then proceeded to crash into a wall. Now I cannot fly it because one of the motors stopped working, and I can't return it because it's completely scratched up from the crash. Cool product but super problematic
customer_reviews.author: hilaugh741

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Drone
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a low-cost entry-level drone. Holy Stone customer support is among the best. They sent me a much smaller Drone free as I had some issues with the F181C. The smaller drone is basic and easier to fly but the camera in the F181C is what I used the most and will shop for another Drone with the camera. Probably a better one costing more, But Holy Stone makes the best entry level drone. Highly recommend the F181C,
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Issue resolved
customer_reviews.text: This thing flew away the third time we used it. My husband has a very expensive drone, knows how to use them and this one literally did not respond to the controller and flew away. I'm incredibly disappointed. Update - After contacting the company they sent us a new drone and everything works great. The customer service was great and I would do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: ron gutowski

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I finally figured out the charging thing, with help from the e-mail team and launched for the first time. WOW! I flew it with some control and landed it without crashing it. WOOHOO! I have so much to learn and excited to figure it out. I think it is a great value for tons of fun. Plus, the camera will be a whole new chapter.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Grande

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly very lightweight design which is great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fly very lightweight design which is great for beginners. Speed is good for a beginner design and so is range. I would like to see longer battery more efficient design with perhaps 12 minutes flight time for more enjoyment. The motors must cool after the 7 minute flight so requires a 15 minute downtime between flight when replacing batteries. However the landing struts could be mechanically designed better to attach to the drone. Overall good beginner drone.
customer_reviews.author: Julio PTop Contributor: Metal Detecting

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed; lots of issues from Day 1
customer_reviews.text: From day 1 there has been issues with the drone, including stripped out screws not allowing me to fix it when the motor blew. Once I was able to figure out a way to fix the motor, it only flew for a week. Then there were more issues with the motors. Two months after purchase it stopped flying. Customer was friendly but kept on used parts and stalling. All they really seemed concerned about was getting a good review and not really fixing the issues. When the drone did fly it was fun, but unfortunately it was broken far more of the time than it worked. Very disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Michalets

customer_reviews.title: Great for young beginners
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quad. I bought it for my 7 year old who has minimal experience flying. He is able to fly this one very well. We especially like the altitude hold feature. It let's him figure out which direction he is facing without having to worry about maintaining altitude. Battery life is about as advertised. We also enjoy watching the videos, but remember to adjust the camera angle prior to flight so it looks down some otherwise there isn't much to look at, lol. And remember it records audio well when it isn't in flight so your commentary is memorialized lol
customer_reviews.author: Joel Clark

customer_reviews.title: Initial review
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, and am new to drones. My 9 year old daughter & I put this together and got it flying very quickly. The wind really does affect the flight of the drones! We had it in light wind, and after some practice, could control it pretty well. Video camera produced good movies. Easy to swap out batteries, and to remove the card that stores the videos. I look forward to flying it higher and further in the near future, and will report back on my thoughts after that. Until then, very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont crash! and make sure you turn off the power as soon as possible to save your motors!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't handle crashes very well, but overall it was a descent drone for the 10 mins I had it in the air. The motors burn up quick and had to buy a new set. --Update-- Not exactly sure what made me crash, but like a lot of other reviews Holy Stone reached out after my review and they sent me a replacement drone... I have to admit their customer service is amazing. I'm speechless! Thank you! I definitely will buy Holy Stone products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great drone. Easy to fly and does flips!!  Get extra batteries and Charger Station! It is Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cool! Got it yesterday, charged up the batteries and was excited for my son to get home from school to fly it. Got it set up and connected and flying in no time. He loves the turning feature so you can rotate the drone while you fly to make it easier to control. Goes super high and does FLIPS! Very well lit up and easy to spot in the sky. We bough the Holy Stone 2x 3.7 V 750 mAh batteries and the 4 in 1 drone Battery charger. Highly recommend them as a much have with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: READ THE MANUAL!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Holy Stone F181C recently and I’m still learning. Camera is okay, however I’m still learning to fly it well before I do much photography. I’ve made some mistakes and learned from them and I continue to read the manual which I must say is the most important part of learning. READ! READ! READ! Many of your problems will be solved that way. Holy Stone has been very supportive with emails checking to make sure all was going well. I’ve had no problems which required calling them but I would not hesitate if I needed extra help. For the money, I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LADavis

customer_reviews.title: This one was a good pick. I'm not sure he has taken pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grand nephews BD on 6/9. He had a lesser "starter" drone. He was ready for a more advanced drone. This one was a good pick. I'm not sure he has taken pictures with it yet but he is flying it. He is pretty good at it. I would buy this again for my niece. I may buy it for me. Five stars for my points in choosing this gift. I'm not sure on flight times or how easy it is to land but from all accounts it is a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginner drone!
customer_reviews.text: My ole man loves this. Great beginner drone. Customer service was very helpful with tech. issue. Fast response. Now he doesn't go more than a couple days without playing with his drone. He is like a kid again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cox

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: We are not drone novices, let's get that clear. First go with this drone, about 7 min it became unresponsive to controls, and flew off. We live in the country on a hilltop with expansive views: it kept going higher and away from us, then took a sharp, diagonal descent to the ground, about 1/3 mile away from us. We never found it.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Nice-Stable Quadcopter
customer_reviews.text: Nice quad, very stable, altitude hold is a great feature - it allows you to take panoramic video at a stable fixed altitude. The video and stills are of good quality for a 2 megapixel camera. Read the manual and follow the instructions. The only negative comment: After a bump into the sofa one of the motors quit. Holystone promptly sent 4 replacements! Be advised motor replacement is tedious task requiring complete disassembly of the unit and minor soldering. Overall, a nice introduction to RC flying and excellent service from Holystone. I definitely recommend this quadcopter.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great first-timer drone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first drone that I have purchased. It is very easy to learn how to fly and it comes with three speeds to increase as you become more comfortable flying it. I have crashed it numerous times and it is still flying perfectly. I had an issue with the camera (not related to any crashes) and they sent me a replacement within a week. Their customer service is amazing. I highly recommend this drone to anyone looking for a beginner's drone.
customer_reviews.author: AM15

customer_reviews.title: Came with two batteries and two Chargers one charger doesn't work and batteries don't last long
customer_reviews.text: Originally I placed a 5-star review because we wanted the extra free battery they offered without using the vehicle, but after we've used it for several days since Christmas we've realized that one of the Chargers doesn't work at all so we're only operating with one battery at a time and the batteries don't last that long as well, will be in touch with the company to get new Chargers. But overall the Drone is a decent one just wish we had a charger that worked and extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Flew away and never got it back
customer_reviews.text: Update: I changed my rating from 2 stars (for the reasons below in my initial post) to 4 stars based soley on their customer service. I sent an email to them explaining the situation and they responded that same day. I had to answer a ton of questions but in the end they sent us a brand new drone. Original review: Had this drone for not even 24 hrs and it flew away! It was a great drone and fun to fly if you kept it low and close. Flew it up about as high as our deck and it took off never to be seen again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great intermediate drone, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bough this drone for my as a step up from the previous drone he had been learning on. for its cost, this drone has alot of fun features and good range. The video quality expectations should be kept in line with it's price, it can get a little choppy and funky. Battery life is solid, and the unit came with a second battery which was very much appreciated. Overall a solid fun little drone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly, battery life 15 minutes and great videos.
customer_reviews.text: This here is my first drone, I wanted to learn how to fly a drone before getting into an expensive hobby. This little drone made my experience very enjoyable. I managed to fly it indoors, it’s quiet and the camera takes great video and pictures. The battery lasts about 15 minutes, it does come with two! I really recommend buying this drone for a newbie before getting into a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quadcopter as a birthday present for my son. He loved it. It was pretty easy to learn how to fly it. And the camera produced some nice video. Unfortunately, after a couple of rough but not extremely hard landings, the small plastic gear on top of one of the quad motors fell out disabling the quadcopter. Holy Stone, however, demonstrated fantastic customer service. They are making it right by replacing the quad copter. Hopefully this was just an anomaly with the purchased unit. I really look forward to receiving the replacement unit. This product seems pretty durable otherwise and is a load of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Archie M Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Controls are very sensitive - a little goes a long way - when learning!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! For me, this was a great choice as I had no knowledge of drones or their operation. This one is good for beginners and especially for me. It has been very forgiving to my small crashes and bad landings. The controls are very sensitive - so a little goes a long way. The wind is NOT your friend. Do not try and fly in the wind - even a small breeze may take it away or out of reach. I have not had to use their customer support but I see most have gave it good marks - very important.
customer_reviews.author: rleeAZ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Drone
customer_reviews.text: Faulty take off and poor control. Seriously disappointed today on a calm sunny day the drone took off and just keep going to the point of being a dot. Was unable to find.
customer_reviews.author: Sande Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a first time basic drone user
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone for my 12 year old son. He was able to immediately figure out how to put it together, charge and install the batteries, easily fly and maneuver, do flips, and take videos and photos. He flies it inside and outside of the house. He is thoroughly enjoying this drone. The drone is very light so any wind will impact flight. The photos are solid, however, the videos are a little jumpy. The batteries only last about 8 to 10 minutes and takes about 100 minutes to charge so it is recommended to get extra batteries. All in all a great product for a first time basic drone user.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend This, YES!
customer_reviews.text: We received our drone, but it would not allow us to get the gyroscope centered. Sent an email to the company and within days, they sent us a second drone and it is a blast to fly. We have the kids trying to run to keep up with it in the back yard. I couldn't believe how quickly they replied and that they replaced the first drone. We are first time drone fliers, but it is very easy to operate once you get the hang of it. Really only took a few minutes to get it figured out. Haven't tried the 360 degree roll yet, but next none windy day, we'll be out there having a great time again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Until then everything worked fine. Enjoyed flying it
customer_reviews.text: The third time I flew it had problems starting engine, when it finally did start I had no control. It starting going up and would not stop. Last sighted somewhere over Tampa Bay going East, Until then everything worked fine. Enjoyed flying it, but would not buy another,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flies Great but SSD won't stay in
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while to figure out how to get it off the ground. A YouTube video helped a bunch with that. The maintain altitude feature is very, very cool. I also got it trimmed out to where it stays in roughly the same place unless I move it intentionally. The only thing is that I cannot seem to get the memory card to stay in the camera. Luckily I was using it indoors on wood so it was easy to find the SD card laying on the floor. I'm sure there's something that can be done about it. Right now I am enjoying flying the F181 I'll update this review after I hear back from Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for teenage son = BIG hit! Fun to fly, and takes pretty good video to boot. Compared several similar drones, and glad we picked this one. Great that it came with two batteries. A high wind can make it hard to fly, but that was to be expected. He did adjusted the camera to make it take more of a horizontal shot, but not a huge issue. It is a plus that the drone can be easily reconfigured. Definitely recommend this if you don't want to spend several hundred dollars and still have an enjoyable flying experience and decent images. One other plus is that it is light enough to not require federal registration.
customer_reviews.author: Clmbake

customer_reviews.title: Altitude hold did not work, flew away and not found.
customer_reviews.text: Flew outdoors for first time. The altitude hold did not work and once the copter reached 40 feet it kept going higher and farther away. Unable to find where it landed after searching for an hour. Something must have malfunctioned for it to just stop responding and fly away. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John D Brase

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother in-law for his birthday. Out of the box I was impressed. Quality looked great (for the money) and upon charging it took off just fine. No need for trimming as it seems to do that on it's own. Nice to see that it came with a spare battery so you can have one charged up for when the 1st battery dies (life span seemed to last about 7-10 minutes). The flip option was cool, too. I can see why this received the good reviews that it has! I now have to buy another one... for my son.
customer_reviews.author: jaxgsxr

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, is my first flight of any drone in my life, still hard to control, but looks amazing so far, good quality pictures and video, a little hard to do the perfect picture but I guess I need some practice. Only problem so fat is the documentation, I don't think is good, I have been using YouTube videos to find what I need maybe this is a good way for the vendor to improve the experience of this product more, create a couple of videos with tutorials about this device.
customer_reviews.author: rogerscuall

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: This drone exceeded all our expectations. I ordered the f181c as this was our first drone After flying it and having a great time with it I would recommend this drone to anyone who wants to learn and get a top notch drone for a fantastic price. The customer service is ABOVE awesome and I will be a customer for life
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a beginner in the "under $100" category
customer_reviews.text: This drone is good considering the price and the target audience...which is a beginner. Besides that, the customer service exceeded my expectations. If you are new to drones and want to get some practice flying before you spend some big money on a more sophisticated drone, or if this is for a eight to ten year old child, then this drone would be a good one to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work...the propellers spun...but didn't fly...the joysticks were non responsive
customer_reviews.text: I charged the batteries, I even bought extra ones... we had a chore to bind to the remote. It was my first drone. All the other buttons worked, but lifting off with the joysticks were non responsive. So I returned it, and will be more careful in the next drone buying. I want ones that work...
customer_reviews.author: 2rain

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11 year old for his birthday. Had many good flights. He has learned to control it well. Definitely harder to do if it is not a still day. Had some issues but received tremendous customer service! The only thing to be aware of is that you need to go through the proper steps to pair the drone and the controller each time. Do not skip steps. If you are unsure if it paired correctly, stop and start over from the beginning. Otherwise you will have issues. Read the instructions, take it slow, and practice.
customer_reviews.author: d.g.grove

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate from beginners and up
customer_reviews.text: I found this company doung a search on google for best drones under 200 dollars and this was number one at the time. I read reviews visited websites and decided to purchase it. Right out of the box it flew like none if my other drones. This drone really makes you feel in control and is so fun to fly. I enjoy the fact I can fly at higher speeds becauseI feel in better control. I recommend this drone for anyone thay wants to improve their flying skills as it did for me with other drones. Ecellent products will purchase more from them soon
customer_reviews.author: Sanford Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I had returned this item because the drone continued to crash but the company was very nice and reached out to me. They sent out another drone without any questions! The second drone work perfectly! My students are using it for mapping and learning different things about Science and Mathematics. Easy to use! Personal is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael G Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: COULD NOT GET THIS DRONE TO WORK :(
customer_reviews.text: Totally my luck. Waited to get this overnight. I plugged it in and had issues out of the box. The lights that allegedly indicate that the batteries are charged are super low tech. There is no way to assert that the batteries are actually charged. The drone remote would not actually pair, it was only pairing 1 out of five attempts and when paired it would only allow the start button to function. Could not get this thing to fly. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The Chaser!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 8 diff drones now and rank this as #1 in my book. The Alt control makes it so much easier to fly as a beginner. This drone is not too heavy or too light and it when you wreck it, it holds up very well. I have not had problems with props breaking or coming off as with other drones. Coming with an additional battery is key as well. If you are considering the best drone for under $100 this could be it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally impressed and more than satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 88 year old man who decided to learn how to fly a drone! So, after much research, I opted to purchase a Holystone F181C drone. No regrets, I'm totally impressed and more than satisfied with my purchase. The quality of my drone and controller far exceeds my expectation. The instruction in the manual is easier to understand than I anticipated, and I was able to learn to fly this drone with ease. Its advertised amenities were not exaggerated! That said, I certainly recommend this drone as a consideration for a beginner or intermediate flyer!
customer_reviews.author: Bill304

customer_reviews.title: Defective item?! Help please?!?
customer_reviews.text: After being out of town for the last several weeks, anticipation of flying my drone was highly elevated. Bring my first drone, I purchased extra batteries in anticipation of flight time. I was sorely disappointed. Upon turning the switch on and locking the controller, I found that one of the motors/blades did not operate. I tried to recalibrate it, off/on switch to maybe reset? But to no avail. Not quite sure what to do now. I am an avid amazon and online shopper and have never had this sort of problem ever. Help?!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Got it up in the air and flew it!
customer_reviews.text: The F181C Drone by Holy Stone is a perfect beginner drone. This drone is easy to control for the first timer (which is what I am). I had purchased a cloned drone previously and was not able to control it. The F181C 6 Axis Gyro Quadcopter is the drone to have. Very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anglemyer

product_meta.title: Holy Stone F181C RC Quadcopter Drone with HD Camera RTF 4 Channel 2.4GHz 6-Gyro with Altitude Hold Function,Headless Mode and One Key Return Home, Color Black
feature_bullets: Equipped with one key return & headless security system to assist beginners and help prevent losing the drone

Altitude hold function: powerful air pressure altitude hold function allows the drone to hover at it's current height after releasing the throttle stick. Easy for you to shoot quality images or videos.
One key 360° 4-ways flip (left, right, forward, backward), Continuous roll for perfect action and wonderful performance
Come with two batteries (bonus battery) for longer flight time.
Range: About 50-100 meters. Battery flight time: about 7-9 minutes. Charging time: about 80 minutes. No FPV (first Person View).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars4,418 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
